SocialMediaPosting.headline: Mr. Isaac Frank’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope for a world where we all care for each other…”

– Mr. Isaac Frank, High School Math Educator @ https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/hope-world-where-we-all-care-each-other/
